alternative_title: Incorporate a private company limited by shares
introduction: You can register ('incorporate') a limited company online if it's a private company [limited by shares and you use model articles of association](/limited-company-formation/ "How to set up a limited company").
more_information:
It usually takes 48 hours and costs £15 (paid by debit or credit card or PayPal account). 

You'll need:

+ the company's name and registered address
+ names and addresses of directors (and company secretary if you have one)
+ details of shareholders and share capital

##Other ways to register

You can use form IN01 to [register different types of limited companies](/limited-company-formation/register-your-company "Register a limited company"), eg using your own articles of association or a company limited by guarantee.
overview: Private company limited by shares - register a company online using model (standard) articles of association, incorporation fees and how long it takes
title: Register a private limited company online
